editPage.showAliasName: display specific resource name when executing
editPage.thirdSlaveTips: if there are several nodes under the environment, assign the ones used last time; if the nodes have not been used before, then assign randomly
editPage.workspaceTips: if not filled, the it will be saved in [Agent installation directory]/workspace/[pipeline ID]/ by default

editPage.defaultValueDesc:
if value is the version number, then it should not contain symbols, such as ����"" ; 
 if the type of parameters can be selected in the check box, when selecting serval values, they will be sent to pipelines in a ��a,b�� way.
editPage.optionsDesc: separate options with line breaks and there should not be an English comma contained in the options. Only one option will be shown if there are serval same options at the same time
editPage.optionTips: please break your lines if there are serval things to be recorded
editPage.relativePathTips: please fill in relative path to code repository. If left empty, the subdirectory under the root path of code repository will be pulled out.

editPage.buildResType: please select the type of build resources
editPage.filterRuleTips: support * (wildcard character)��if left empty, then the file path can��t be matched

editPage.noPermToInstall: no permission to install this plug-in
editPage.notIntroduceReason: this plug-in is no longer recommended to use and will be withdrawn due to its design flaw or the change in the way of implementing it. There is usually a substitute for it, so please use the new one
editPage.envUseTips: usable under compiling environment, please switch to the corresponding type of job and then try again
editPage.noEnvUseTips: this plug-in is usable without compiling environment, please switch to the corresponding type of job and then try again
editPage.badLink: the format of this link is incorrect
editPage.repoConflict: , several codes in the current pipeline are pulling the same plug-in, you need to set this field to settle this clash
editPage.svnVersionTips: SVN pulls the version number specified by code plug-ins
editPage.certInstallTips: the third-party building machine doesn't support the plug-in of installing IOS certificate at the moment
editPage.noAppIdTips: the plug-in you are using requires the service provided by Blue Whale. Please contact DevOps (customer service from Blue Shield) to enable it.
editPage.namespaceTips:
used to solve the problem that when the same plug-in exists in several instances under a pipeline, there is a clash of using the output fields. 
 when there is no clash, then no need to add name space. 
 after editing the name space, such edition should also be synchronized to other fields that use this name space

storeMap.oneCodecc: only one code is allowed to scan plug-ins
storeMap.oneManualTrigger: only one manually-triggered plug-in can exist in pipeline
storeMap.oneTimerTrigger: only one plug-in triggered by timer can exist in pipeline
storeMap.oneRemoteTrigger: only one remotely-triggered plug-in triggered can exist in pipeline
storeMap.timeoutDesc: all the integers between 0 and 10080 with 0 indicating the maximum timeout allowed by the system
storeMap.timeoutPlaceholder: all the integers between 0 and 10080 with 0 indicating the maximum timeout allowed by the system
storeMap.atomPreSuc: run it when all the pre-plugins are run successfully
storeMap.atomEvenFail: unless cancelled, run it even when it is failed to run the pre-plugins
storeMap.atomOnlyFail: run it only when it is failed to run some pre-plugin(s)
storeMap.varMatch: run it only when it is failed to run some pre-plugin(s)
storeMap.varNotMatch: don‘t run it when all the custom variables are macthed
storeMap.mutualGroupNamePlaceholder: the field must be filled and only supports English letter, numbers or variables
storeMap.queueEnable: enable the queue of mutually exclusive groups
storeMap.mutualTimeoutPlaceholder: please fill in an integer between 1 and 10080
storeMap.queuePlaceholder: please fill in an integer between 1 and 10
